description:
==============================================================

EXTREMELY USEFUL TO UNDERSTAND THE BASIC CONCEPTS

===============================================================

At the end of this course, you will get the knowledge of...

Basic Concepts of Oracle eBusiness, Overview of Oracle Inventory, The Multi-Org and its Usage in eBusiness, Working with R12 Inventory in Oracle application, Concept of costing and its Impact on Transactions, Period Opening and Closing
title: Oracle Applications R12 Inventory - Fundamentals
